headline: The OpenSSL Corporation and the OpenSSL Foundation Celebrate the Success of the Inaugural OpenSSL Conference in Prague
summary: The OpenSSL Corporation and the OpenSSL Foundation celebrate the success of the inaugural OpenSSL Conference, held in Prague, October 7-9. This was the first time in the history of the OpenSSL Project that the full community met in person. Developers, legal experts, and users from academics, committers, distributions, individuals, large businesses, and small businesses came together to discuss project direction, share experience, and collaborate on the future of secure digital communication.

headline: Tesla Investors Pivot to Dreams of AI Future as EV Sales to Slow
summary: Chief among them is its stunning lack of earnings growth while its stock price continues to soar.  The Elon Musk-led electric vehicle-maker is expected to post a 25% drop in third-quarter profits from a year ago when it reports earnings Wednesday afternoon, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.  The decline is nothing new, as Tesla’s results have been in retreat for multiple years.

headline: Bubble Watch: AI Is Changing Everything, But No One Pays For It (MSFT, NVDA)

headline: Beyond Meat and Gold Are Wall Street’s Odd Couple. It Must Be FOMO.
summary: When a company that hasn’t posted a quarterly profit in more than five years surges more than 140% in a day, and the world’s benchmark flight-to-safety asset falls the most in five years, it is safe to say there is something weird happening in financial markets.  Stock in the plant-based food company is now trading more than 700% north of last week’s closing prices.  Gold’s recent record-setting rally, and this week’s near 8% slump, also suggest there has been a level of FOMO, or fear of missing out, that has led risk-seeking investors into different corners of the market in search for the next big move.

raw.headline: Beyond Meat and Gold Are Wall Street’s Odd Couple. It Must Be FOMO.

Gold’s recent record-setting rally, and this week’s near 8% slump, also suggest there has been a level of FOMO, or fear of missing out, that has led risk-seeking investors into different corners of the market in search for the next big move.

headline: Focus on AI and growth at a reasonable price, strategist says
summary: Citi analysts recommended that investors look at the growing tech landscape through the lens of "Growth at a Reasonable Price," or GARP, as Wall Street continues to chatter on the likelihood of an AI bubble forming.  Citi Head of US equity strategy Scott Chronert comes on Market Catalysts to talk about how his team is analyzing AI growth. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
